name: Selde
appearance: Lean and sun-creased, salt-burn freckles, lacquered ledgersman’s nails, wind-bell earrings that chime softly when she turns her head.
character: Shrewd and patient, refuses to hurry a deal; speaks little, listens for what costs men sleep.
talents: can taste adulterated salt at a grain
flaws: neglects water and health during negotiations
dreams: make the Salt Crown Exchange the city’s true heart
break the pilots’ monopoly without bloodshed
secrets: authorized a quiet run of counterfeit bricks to test Exchange inspectors
keeps a private ledger of debt-chains that could topple rivals
